meanings.sent1: The seal's blubbery skin kept it warm in the cold ocean waters.
meanings.sent2: The blubbery texture of the whale's skin helps it stay insulated in icy seas.
meanings.sent3: The blubbery sea lion looked quite content basking in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The blubbery layers of fat on the walrus protected it from the freezing temperatures.
meanings.sent5: The blubbery appearance of the seal made it appear like a floating pillow in the water.

meanings.sent1: The blubbery man struggled to fit into his old jeans.
meanings.sent2: The blubbery cat lazily lounged in the sunbeam.
meanings.sent3: Despite his blubbery appearance, the bear moved surprisingly fast when chasing prey.
meanings.sent4: The blubbery penguin waddled awkwardly across the icy terrain.
meanings.sent5: Her blubbery cheeks jiggled when she laughed heartily at the joke.
